testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@yahoo.com" field.................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@yahoo.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "tet@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: user could change currency to Euro successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to Home Page..................................................passed When user select euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then the products in home page is displayed in Euro Currency................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user could search for any products on the website
testcase.name: user could search using Product name
testcase.system-out: Given user go to Home Page..................................................passed When user write book in search field........................................passed And user click search button................................................passed Then user go to search results page.........................................passed And user find that the search shows relevant results to the book............passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user could search for any products on the website
testcase.name: user could search for product using sku
testcase.system-out: Given user go to Home Page..................................................passed When user search for Products by SCI_FAITH..................................passed And user click search button................................................passed Then user find the searched product and open it.............................passed And user find that the sku in the product page contains the SCI_FAITH that was used in search.passed

testcase.classname: F05_HoverCategories | user could choose from Categories in Home Page
testcase.name: user hover on main Categories and select Category Successfully
